answers.answer: Why have you lost sensation? Are there any other parts of your body that have become less sensitive? There are a several causes for changes in sensation, such as diabetes, several drugs and a number of other general medical conditions. I do not know of any medications that will solve your problem but you need to see a urologist or primary care physician to see what is going on and what can be done to prevent further changes.Go to SMSNA.org which is the web site for the Society of Sexual Medicine, North America and see who is listed in your area.S.A.Liroff, M.D.

question: I am a 48 year old male who has lost a lot of sensation in the penis.  Some days are great; others are not.Are there any medications I can apply to bring back the sensation or regenerate the nerve endings on the glans as well as the rest of the penis?  Or is ther ANY injections or pill that can help?Also, is there a specialist in the DC area that can handle this type of issue?Thanks a lot.
title: Improve Penile Sensation
